description:
Beautiful, Super-Clean and modern 1 bedroom in safe and great neighborhood on the Upper East Side. 
All the amenities you will need and you Walk to Central Park and museums. 

2 min walk to subway

modern and clean with a private garden.

you will pick up the key fob from the Key Cafe...they will send you instructions and code to retrieve.

I'm just a text away if you need anything
name: Cozy Oasis with Private Garden in Prime Location!
review: Helen has been a fantastic host and very accommodating. The apartment is beautiful and clean.    Absolutely recommended.
